anya-e0903n2:3: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte paṭhamaṁ nakulapitusuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:4_0: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye nakulapitaraṁ gahapatiṁ
anya-e0903n2:4_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Nakulapitā bhante gahapati bhagavantaṁ ‘‘ahamasmi bhante jiṇṇo
anya-e0903n2:4_2: vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko, aniccadassāvī
anya-e0903n2:4_3: kho panāhaṁ bhante bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ, ovadatu maṁ bhante bhagavā,
anya-e0903n2:4_4: anusāsatu maṁ bhante bhagavā, yaṁ mamassa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:4_5: bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘evametaṁ gahapati, evametaṁ gahapati, āturo hāyaṁ gahapati kāyo
anya-e0903n2:4_6: aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho, yo hi gahapati imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ
anya-e0903n2:4_7: paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā. Tasmātiha te gahapati evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ ‘āturakāyassa
anya-e0903n2:4_8: me sato cittaṁ anāturaṁ bhavissatī’ti. Evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabba’’nti. Evaṁ
anya-e0903n2:6: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā saṁkhittena bhāsitaṁ vitthārena kena kathañca vibhattaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:7_0: Vissajjanā – taṁ kho bhante bhagavatā saṁkhittena desitaṁ ‘‘kathañca gahapati āturakāyo
anya-e0903n2:7_1: ceva hoti āturacitto ca. Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa
anya-e0903n2:7_2: akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme
anya-e0903n2:7_3: avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:7_4: vā attānaṁ, ‘‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpa’’nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti. Tassa ‘‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ
anya-e0903n2:7_5: mama rūpa’’nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti. Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
anya-e0903n2:7_6: uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtena
anya-e0903n2:9: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ aniccasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:10_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ bhikkhaveaniccaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:10_1: vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ. Evaṁ passaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:10_2: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n2:10_3: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n2:10_4: vimuttasmiṁ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṁ hotī’’ti. Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:12: Pucchā – dukkhaanattasuttāni panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n2:13_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ bhikkhave dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:13_1: vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ. Rūpaṁ bhikkhave anattā,
anya-e0903n2:13_2: vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṁ anattā. Evaṁ passaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:13_3: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n2:13_4: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n2:13_5: vimuttasmiṁ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṁ hoti, khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:13_6: nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānātī’’ti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n2:15: Pucchā – bhārasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:16_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘bhārañca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:16_1: desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca, taṁ suṇātha. Katamo ca bhikkhavebhāro,
anya-e0903n2:16_2: ‘pañcupādānakkhandhā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ. Katame pañca, rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho
anya-e0903n2:16_3: saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho. Ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:17: Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo;
anya-e0903n2:19: Nikkhipitvā garuṁ bhāraṁ, aññaṁ bhāraṁ anādiya;
anya-e0903n2:22: Pucchā – na tumhākasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:23: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhu ārabbha ‘‘yaṁ bhikkhave natumhākaṁ taṁ pajahatha, taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāyabhavissatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:25: Pucchā – anattalakkhaṇasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:26_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘rūpaṁ
anya-e0903n2:26_1: bhikkhave anattā, rūpañca hidaṁ bhikkhave attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ rūpaṁ ābādhāya
anya-e0903n2:26_2: saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:28: Pucchā – theravagge panāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ yamakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:29_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ yamakattheraṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n2:29_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmato bhante yamakattherassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ
anya-e0903n2:29_2: uppannaṁ hoti ‘‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu
anya-e0903n2:29_3: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁmaraṇā’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:29_4: ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n2:30_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa
anya-e0903n2:31_0: Vissajjanā – taṁ kiṁ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṁ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti. ‘No
anya-e0903n2:31_1: hetaṁ āvuso’. Vedanaṁ. Saññaṁ. Saṅkhāre. Viññāṇaṁ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti.
anya-e0903n2:31_2: ‘No hetaṁ āvuso’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato
anya-e0903n2:31_3: yamakattherassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṁ pavattesi.
anya-e0903n2:32: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṁ, vedanaṁ, saññaṁ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṁ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasi–
anya-e0903n2:34: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte theravagge pañcamaṁ vakkalisuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:35_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ theraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n2:35_1: bhante vakkalithero ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘cirapaṭikāhaṁ
anya-e0903n2:35_2: bhante bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo, natthi ca me kāyasmiṁ tāvatikā balamattā,
anya-e0903n2:35_3: yāvatāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkameyya’’nti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘alaṁ
anya-e0903n2:35_4: vakkali, kiṁ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali dhammaṁ passati, so maṁ
anya-e0903n2:35_5: passati, yo maṁ passati, so dhammaṁ passati. Dhammañhi vakkali passanto maṁ passati,
anya-e0903n2:35_6: maṁ passanto dhammaṁ passati. Taṁ kiṁ maññasi vakkali , rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti
anya-e0903n2:36: ‘‘Ahaṁ vakkali, kiṁ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena’’ –
anya-e0903n2:37: ‘‘Taṁ kiṁ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ –
anya-e0903n2:39: ‘‘Yaṁ panāniccaṁ, dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā’’–
anya-e0903n2:41: Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ ‘‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’’–
anya-e0903n2:42_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso punapi bhagavā bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṁ
anya-e0903n2:42_1: ārocāpesi. Sopi kathaṁ attano pavattiṁ bhagavato paccārocāpesi. Kathañcassa abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n2:43_0: Vissajjanā – suṇāvuso tvaṁ vakkali bhagavato vacanaṁ dvinnañca devatānaṁ, imaṁ āvuso
anya-e0903n2:43_1: rattiṁ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n2:44_0: Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu,
anya-e0903n2:44_1: ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho āvuso ekā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n2:44_2: vimokkhāya cetetī’ti. Aparā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘so hi nūna bhante suvimutto
anya-e0903n2:44_3: vimuccissatī’ti. Bhagavā ca taṁ āvuso vakkali evamāha ‘mā bhāyi vakkali, mā bhāyi
anya-e0903n2:44_4: vakkali, apāpakaṁ te maraṇaṁ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’ti. Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0903n2:44_5: punapi bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṁ ārocāpesi. Sopi bhante
anya-e0903n2:44_6: āyasmā tenahāvuso mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha ‘‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n2:44_7: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’’ti, evañca vadetha
anya-e0903n2:44_8: ‘‘rūpaṁ aniccaṁ, tāhaṁ bhante na kaṅkhāmi, yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhanti navicikicchāmi,
anya-e0903n2:44_9: yadaniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁvāti
anya-e0903n2:44_10: na vicikicchāmī’’ti evamādinā bhagavato attano pavattiṁ paccārocāpesi. So hi bhante
anya-e0903n2:44_11: āyasmā acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṁ āharitvā vedanaṁ vikkhambhetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0903n2:44_12: ādāya sampajāno arahattaṁ sacchikatvā kālamakāsi. Evaṁ kho bhante tassa āyasmato
anya-e0903n2:46: Pucchā – assajisuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:47_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante assaji
anya-e0903n2:47_1: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘pubbe khvāhaṁ bhante gelaññe
anya-e0903n2:47_2: passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṁ samādhiṁ nappaṭilabhāmi. Tassa
anya-e0903n2:47_3: mayhaṁ bhante taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhato evaṁ hoti no cassāhaṁ parihāyāmī’’ti. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:47_4: bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘ye te assaji samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā, tesaṁ
anya-e0903n2:47_5: taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhataṁ evaṁ hoti ‘no cassu mayaṁ parihāyāmā’ti. Taṁ kiṁ maññasi
anya-e0903n2:47_6: assaji, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:49: Pucchā – khemakasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:50_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante sambahule there bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā khemakattherena
anya-e0903n2:50_1: bhāsitaṁ. Sambahulā bhante therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dāsakaṁ pesetvā catukkhattuṁ
anya-e0903n2:50_2: āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ gelaññakāraṇañca dhammañca pucchiṁsu
anya-e0903n2:50_3: , tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā. Seyyathidaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:50_5: viññāṇupādānakkhandho, imesu khvāhaṁ āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ
anya-e0903n2:50_6: vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:51_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā khemako uttari dhammadesanaṁ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena
anya-e0903n2:51_1: therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ desesi. Kīdiso ca nesaṁ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṁ dhammadesanāya ānisaṁso adhigato.
anya-e0903n2:52_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante vāre āyasmā khemako ‘‘alaṁ āvuso dāsaka kiṁ imāya sandhāvanikāya,
anya-e0903n2:52_1: āharāvuso daṇḍaṁ, ahameva therānaṁ santikaṁ gamissāmī’’ti daṇḍamolubbha āyasmā khemako
anya-e0903n2:52_2: yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi pucchito ‘‘nakhvāhaṁ
anya-e0903n2:52_3: āvuso rūpaṁ asmīti vadāmi, napi aññatra rūpā asmīti vadāmi. Na khvāhaṁ āvuso vedanaṁ
anya-e0903n2:52_4: asmīti vadāmi, napi aññatra vedanā asmīti vadāmī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā khemako
anya-e0903n2:52_5: uttaripi dhammadesanaṁ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena desesi. Imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:52_6: bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu
anya-e0903n2:52_7: āyasmatoca khemakassa. Evaṁ kho bhante tesaṁ therānaṁ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṁ
anya-e0903n2:54: Pucchā – channasuttaṁ panāvuso kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:55_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n2:55_1: bhante channatthero āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca ‘‘ovadatu maṁ āyasmā ānando, anusāsatu
anya-e0903n2:55_2: maṁ āyasmā ānando, karotu me āyasmā ānando dhammiṁ kathaṁ, yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyya’’nti.
anya-e0903n2:55_3: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘sammukhā me taṁ āvuso channa bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā
anya-e0903n2:55_4: paṭiggahitaṁ kaccānagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ ovadantassa, dvayanissito khvāyaṁ kaccāna loko
anya-e0903n2:55_5: yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca, lokasamudayaṁ kho kaccāna yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya
anya-e0903n2:55_6: passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hotī’’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n2:56: Ovadatu maṁ āyasmā ānando, anusāsatu maṁ āyasmā ānando.
anya-e0903n2:58: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṁyutte pupphavagge pupphasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:59_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘nāhaṁ bhikkhave lokena
anya-e0903n2:59_1: vivadāmi, lokova mayā vivadati, na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṁ vivadati,
anya-e0903n2:59_2: yaṁ bhikkhave natthi sammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, ahampitaṁ ‘‘natthī’’ti vadāmi, yaṁ
anya-e0903n2:59_3: bhikkhave atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, ahampitaṁ ‘‘atthī’’ti vadāmī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:61: Na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṁ vivadati.
anya-e0903n2:63: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pheṇapiṇḍūpamasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:64_0: Vissajjanā – ayujjhāyaṁ bhante gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n2:64_1: bhikkhave ayaṁ gaṅgā nadī mahantaṁ pheṇapiṇḍaṁ āvaheyya, tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso
anya-e0903n2:64_2: passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya, tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato
anya-e0903n2:64_3: rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva khāyeyya, asārakaññeva khāyeyya, kiṁ siyā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:64_4: pheṇapiṇḍe sāro. Evameva kho bhikkhave yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁvā
anya-e0903n2:64_5: bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, taṁ
anya-e0903n2:64_6: bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati, tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso
anya-e0903n2:64_7: upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati, tucchakaññeva khāyati, asārakaññeva khāyati,
anya-e0903n2:64_8: kiñhi siyā bhikkhave rūpe sāro’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:69: Rittakaṁ tucchakaṁ hoti, yo naṁ passati yoniso.
anya-e0903n2:71: Pahānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ, rūpaṁ passatha chaḍḍitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:72: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṁ, yadā kāyaṁ jahantimaṁ;
anya-e0903n2:75: Vadhako esa akkhāto, sāro ettha na vijjati.
anya-e0903n2:77: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṁ, sampajāno paṭissato.
anya-e0903n2:81: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammakathikavagge dutiyadhammakathikasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:82_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Aññatamo bhante
anya-e0903n2:82_1: bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘dhammakathiko dhammakathikoti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n2:82_2: nu kho bhante dhammakathiko hoti, kittāvatā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n2:82_3: diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hotī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘rūpassa ce bhikkhu
anya-e0903n2:82_4: nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṁ vacanāyā’’ti
anya-e0903n2:84: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ sīlavantasuttañca sutavantasuttañca kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:85_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n2:85_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā
anya-e0903n2:85_2: vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca
anya-e0903n2:85_3: ‘‘sīlavatāvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā. Sutāvatāvuso
anya-e0903n2:85_4: sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n2:85_5: ‘‘sīlavatāvuso koṭṭhika bhikkhunā, sutāvatāvuso koṭṭhika bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0903n2:85_6: aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato
anya-e0903n2:85_7: anattato yoniso manasikātabbā’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:88: Pucchā – rādhasaṁyutte panāvuso dutiyaṁ sattasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:89_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ rādhattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n2:89_1: bhante rādhatthero bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘satto sattoti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n2:89_2: nu kho bhante sattoti vuccatī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘rūpe kho rādha yo chando
anya-e0903n2:89_3: yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:92: Pucchā – diṭṭhisaṁyutte panāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ soattā suttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:93_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘kismiṁ nu kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:93_1: sati kiṁ upādāya kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati so attā so loko so pecca bhavissāmi
anya-e0903n2:93_2: nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:95: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṁ natthidinnasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:96_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘kismiṁ nu kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n2:96_1: sati kiṁ upādāya kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati natthi dinnaṁ, natthi yiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0903n2:96_2: natthi hutaṁ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṁ kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:99: Pucchā – okkantasaṁyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṁ cakkhusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:100_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘cakkhuṁ bhikkhave aniccaṁ
anya-e0903n2:100_1: vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi. Sotaṁ. Ghānaṁ. Jivhaṁ. Kāyo. Mano anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī’’ti
anya-e0903n2:103: Pucchā – sāriputtasaṁyutte panāvuso dasamaṁ sucimukhīsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:104_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sucimukhiṁ paribbājikaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n2:104_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ. Sucimukhī bhante paribbājikā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca
anya-e0903n2:104_2: ‘‘kiṁ nu kho samaṇa adhomukho bhuñjasī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘na khvāhaṁ
anya-e0903n2:104_3: bhagini adhomukho bhuñjāmī’’ti evamādinā paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘ye hi keci bhagini samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0903n2:104_4: vatthuvijjā tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṁ kappenti, ime vuccanti bhagini
anya-e0903n2:104_5: samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhomukhā bhuñjantī’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n2:105: Kiṁ nu kho samaṇa adho mukho bhuñjasi.
